Title: Special type missing
Description: Special type is missing; please check the code analysis project and change the namespace.

Title: Don't initialize large structure
Description: Don't initialize large structure; please use expected fields or 'Create' methods instead if available.

Title: Large structures should pass by reference
Description: Large structure should pass by reference in order to optimize performance.

Title: Specified field cannot be invoked
Description: Specified field of function pointer type cannot be invoked.

Title: Specified field is not function pointer type
Description: Specified field marked 'DisallowFunctionPointerInvocationAttribute' is not function pointer type.

Title: Specified field can only be accessed in file
Description: Specified field can only be accessed in file where the field is declared.

Title: Specified field marked cannot be private
Description: Specified field marked 'FileAccessOnlyAttribute' cannot be private.

Title: Use type 'Argument' instead
Description: The current 'if' statement can be converted into 'Argument' method invocation; use 'Argument' instead to simplify the code.

Title: Please don't use variable having called 'ToStringAndClear'
Description: Please don't use variable having called 'ToStringAndClear'.

Title: Don't use 'using' keyword on 'StringHandler' type
Description: Don't use 'using' keyword on 'StringHandler' type; please use 'ToStringAndClear' to release memory.

Title: Missing 'SelfAttribute'
Description: Missing 'SelfAttribute'; Don't you infer the self generic argument?

Title: Specified type parameter must be derived from the containing type itself
Description: Specified type parameter must be derived from the containing type itself.

Title: Self type parameter should be named 'TSelf'
Description: Self type parameter should be named 'TSelf'.
